<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Any short term bonus incentive will entitle the Executive to up to a 100% of the Executive&rsquo;s salary by way of cash, subject to the Executive meeting the pre- agreed personal performance targets to the satisfaction of the Board.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	8.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Any long term bonus incentive will entitle the Executive to up to a 100% of the Executive&rsquo;s salary by way of stock options or restricted stock or a combination thereof with a minimum 3 year vesting criteria attached to them, subject to the Company meeting pre-agreed performance targets, as agreed in writing with the Board.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</FONT>

	9.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company shall contribute an annual sum representing between 5% and 10% of the Executive&rsquo;s annual basic salary to the Executive&rsquo;s approved personal pension plan as nominated by the Executive and notified to the Company in writing.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	There is no contracting out certificate in force in respect of the Executive&rsquo;s employment under this agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	10.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company shall (on production of receipts or other evidence as it may require) repay or cause to be repaid to the Executive all travelling, hotel, entertainment, and other out-of-pocket expenses from time to time wholly, exclusively and necessarily incurred by her in the proper performance of her employment duties under this agreement. For the avoidance of doubt, where the Executive is being paid a flat per diem allowance in accordance with Company policy in effect from time to time, she will not have to produce expense vouchers and receipts.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

	11.1

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive shall be eligible for cover under the Company&rsquo;s Private Medical Insurance Scheme (&ldquo;PMI Scheme&rdquo;) along with her spouse or civil partner and her children (including dental cover) and the Company&rsquo;s Permanent Health Scheme (&ldquo;PHI Scheme&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive&rsquo;s entitlements under, and eligibility for, any PMI Scheme or PHI Scheme will be subject to, and determined in accordance with, the rules of the respective schemes (as amended from time to time) and will be dependent on the Executive satisfying any requirements for eligibility imposed by the scheme providers and her acceptance at standard rates of premium.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The provision of these benefits shall be at the Company&rsquo;s discretion. The Company may, on giving the Executive reasonable notice replace, change or withdraw the PMI Scheme and/or the PHI Scheme at any time as it thinks fit. The replacement or change in terms of a scheme may result in the reduction of the Executive&rsquo;s entitlements or the loss or reduction of any benefit the Executive may be receiving or about to receive at the time and the Executive shall have no claim against the Company for any loss arising from such a change.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	It may be (or become) a term of the PMI Scheme and/or PHI Scheme that the Executive must remain employed by the Company to be entitled to benefits under the said schemes. If so, this will not limit the Company&rsquo;s right to terminate the Executive&rsquo;s Appointment on grounds of incapacity to work or any other proper ground. The Executive agrees and acknowledges that if the Appointment is so terminated, she may lose (without recourse to compensation against the Company or any Group Company) existing or prospective benefits under the PMI Scheme and/or PHI Scheme.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	11.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	During the continuation of the Appointment, the Company shall, (subject to receipt of a medical report satisfactory to the life assurance company) and in accordance with the terms of the relevant policy from time to time in force, provide the Executive with life assurance which, in the event of her death while in service, shall provide a lump sum to the value of four times her basic salary (at the then annual rate).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

	Any benefits provided by the Company to the Executive or her family which are not expressly referred to in this agreement shall be regarded as ex-gratia and at the entire discretion of the Company and shall not form part of the Executive&rsquo;s terms of employment.
</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In addition to the usual public holidays in the United Arab Emirates, the Executive shall be entitled to 25 working days&rsquo; paid holiday for each complete calendar year worked (and pro rata for part of each calendar year worked) to be taken at such time or times as may be approved by the Board in advance. Holiday entitlement shall accrue from day to day.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Holiday entitlement may not be carried forward to the next calendar year save with the prior written agreement of the Board and no money will be paid in lieu of any such untaken holiday subject to clause 12.4 below.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	12.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In the event that the Company or the Executive gives notice of termination of the Appointment, the Company may require the Executive to take any holidays which have or will have accrued by the Termination Date during the period of notice, in which case the Executive shall not be entitled to any payment in lieu of such holidays.
</FONT>
</TD>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_152"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	12.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	On the termination of this agreement the Company shall pay the Executive for any accrued but untaken holiday. If the Executive shall have taken more days&rsquo; paid holiday than her accrued entitlement as at the Termination Date, the Executive shall repay to the Company the appropriate amount for each day&rsquo;s paid holiday taken in excess of her accrued entitlement. A day&rsquo;s pay shall be 1/260th of her basic salary and fractions of days shall be rounded to the nearest whole day.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_153"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	INCAPACITY
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	When absent due to sickness or any other reason, the Executive must inform a member of the Board of the cause(s) of her absence as soon as possible on the first working day of absence unless there is a reasonable explanation as to why this is not possible. A self-certification form must be completed to cover up to the first seven days of absence. A doctor&rsquo;s medical certificate must be provided for absences of eight consecutive days or more due to sickness, injury or other incapacity. Certificates must be provided to cover completely any subsequent and consecutive period of absence.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company has the right to require the Executive at any time during a period of absence or within 30 days following her return to work thereafter to produce medical evidence covering the said period of absence (save that absences of less than 7 days may be self-certified in accordance with clause 13.1).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	If required by the Board, the Executive shall undergo examination by a medical adviser to be appointed or approved by the Board and the Executive hereby authorises such medical adviser to disclose the results of any such examination (including any sensitive personal data as defined in the DPA) to the Board and discuss with it any matters arising from the examination as might impair the Executive in property discharging her duties under this agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company may in its absolute discretion pay to the Executive contractual sick pay for such period not exceeding 90 days in aggregate in any rolling 12 month period at such rate or rates as it thinks fit. Contractual sick pay shall be paid net of Government incapacity benefit which, it is assumed, the Executive will claim and receive at the standard rate. Any discretionary payments made by the Company under this clause 13.4 shall be without prejudice to the Company&rsquo;s right to terminate this agreement on the grounds of incapacity or for other proper cause.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company shall be entitled to deduct from any Company sick pay paid to the Executive the amount of any income from any health insurance scheme operated by the Company for the benefit of the Executive, whether or not a claim is made.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	If the Executive is incapable of performing her duties by reason of any accident, illness or injury or other incapacity caused wholly or partly by any act or omission of any third party in relation to which the Executive may be or become entitled to recover damages or compensation, then all net payments made to the Executive under this clause in respect of the said absence shall be loans to the Executive to be repaid if and to the extent that she recovers damages or compensation for loss of earnings from the said third party and/or any other person. Where the Executive receives any damages or compensation for loss of earnings, she shall notify the Company in writing forthwith and shall repay the amount due to the Company under this clause within 28 days of receipt of the said damages or compensation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	13.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company shall be entitled during any period during which the Executive is absent due to accident, illness or injury or other incapacity to appoint any other person or persons to perform the duties and exercise the powers of the Executive in her place on such terms and conditions as the Company shall see fit. On resuming office all powers are to be vested back in the Executive.
</FONT>

	The Executive acknowledges that during her employment by the Company she will receive and have access to Confidential Information.
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_155"></A>

	14.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	All rights, title and interest in and to the Confidential Information shall remain the exclusive property of the Company or, where appropriate, any Group Company and the Executive shall not during the continuance of the Appointment (otherwise than in the proper performance of her duties) or at any time after the Termination Date directly or indirectly use, divulge, export or communicate to any person, firm, company or other organisation any Confidential Information for any purpose whatsoever and shall use her best endeavours to prevent its unauthorised publication, use or disclosure. This obligation shall be in addition to and not in substitution for any express or implied duty of confidentiality owed by the Executive to the Company or any Group Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	After the Termination Date, the restrictions at clause 14.2 shall not apply in respect of any Confidential Information:
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>

	in the public domain, otherwise than as a result of any unauthorised act or omission on the part of the Executive; or
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	which the Executive is required by law to disclose, provided that the Executive first notifies the Company in writing that she is required to disclose such Confidential Information
</FONT>
</TD>

	Nothing
	in this agreement shall prevent the Executive from making a protected disclosure as defined in section 49 of the Employment Act
	2006.

	15.
</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Should the Executive discover or participate in the making or discovery of Intellectual Property in the course of her employment under this agreement (irrespective of whether she was carrying out her normal duties or other tasks specifically assigned to her) then all such Intellectual Property shall belong to the Company absolutely in accordance with, but subject to, the provisions of the Registered Designs Act 1949 (an Act of Parliament as extended to the Isle of Man), the Patents Act 1977 (an Act of Parliament extended to the Isle of Man) and the Copyright Act 1991 and the Design Rights Act 1991, as applicable.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive will forthwith notify to the Company full details of all Intellectual Property which she may make, discover or in/of which she may participate in the making or discovery during the Appointment whether or not in the course of her employment under this agreement and will keep the Company apprised at all times of the stage that has been reached in relation to any improvement or creation of such Intellectual Property. If the Company requests (and at its expense) the Executive shall give and supply all such information, data, drawings and assistance as may be required to enable the Company to exploit the Intellectual Property to the best advantage.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_157"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	At the Company&rsquo;s expense but without payment to the Executive, the Executive shall take all steps and carry out all acts that may be necessary to ensure that title to the Intellectual Property is lawfully vested in the Company, including signing all applications and executing any other documents that may be necessary and will carry out such acts and steps with expedition on the instructions of the Company, in particular where the filing of any claims to such Intellectual Property right may give the Company priority.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive hereby irrevocable appoints the Company as her attorney in her name and on her behalf to execute any documents and generally to act and to use her name for the purpose of giving the full benefit of this clause to the Company (or its nominee). A certificate in writing signed by a director or the secretary of the Company that an instrument or act falls within the authority confirmed by this clause shall be conclusive evidence in favour of a third party that that is the case.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive waives all of her moral rights as defined in the Copyright Act 1991 in relation to the Intellectual Property which is the property of the Company by virtue of clause 15.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	If the Executive makes, discovers or participates in the making or discovery of any Intellectual Property during her Appointment under this agreement but which is not the property of the Company or any Group Company under clause 15.1, the Company shall, subject only to the provisions of the Patents Act 1977 (an Act of Parliament extended to the Isle of Man), have the right to acquire for itself or its nominee the Executive&rsquo;s right in the Intellectual Property within three months after disclosure under clause 15.2 on fair and reasonable terms to be agreed or settled by a single arbitrator appointed jointly by the Company and the Executive or, in default of agreement, nominated by the President of the Isle of Man Law Society for the time being.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	15.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The provisions of this clause 15 shall remain in force with regard to any Intellectual Property made or discovered during the Executive&rsquo;s Appointment under this agreement and shall be binding upon her representatives notwithstanding the termination of the Appointment.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;

	16.
</FONT>
</TD>

	TERMINATION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Notwithstanding the provisions of clause 3.1 above, the Company may terminate the Appointment at any time, immediately without notice and without any obligation to pay any further sums to the Executive whether by way of compensation, damages or otherwise in respect of or in lieu of any notice period or unexpired term of the agreement, and without prejudice to any other rights of the Company if the Executive:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	commits any repeated or continued material breach, or any serious breach, of her obligations to the Company having first been given a reasonable opportunity to remedy the breach (provided it is capable of remedy) by notification from the Board in writing, but having failed to do so; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	is convicted of any serious criminal offence (other than an offence under road traffic legislation for which imprisonment is not a sanction); or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;

	16.1.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	is or becomes incapable by reason of mental disorder within the meaning of the Mental Health Act 1998; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	acts in any manner which in the opinion of the Board brings or is likely to bring her, the Company or any Group Company into material disrepute; or
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>

	is guilty of dishonesty, gross misconduct or any other conduct which, in the opinion of the Board is calculated or likely to materially affect prejudicially the interests of any Group Company whether or not such misconduct or other conduct occurs during or in the context of the Appointment; or
</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_159"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The rights of the Company under clause 16.1 are without prejudice to any other rights it might have under this agreement or at law to terminate the Appointment or to accept any breach of the agreement on the part of the Executive as having brought the agreement to an end. For the avoidance of doubt, where there are no circumstances justifying summary dismissal under clause 16.1, the methods by which the Company may terminate the Appointment are not restricted to the giving of notice in accordance with clauses 3.1 (term of employment) or 16.3 (termination on account of illness or injury) or to the making of a payment in lieu of notice under clause 3.2 (payment in lieu of notice) and accordingly, if the Company terminates the Appointment without giving notice or without making a payment in lieu of notice, any damages to which the Executive may be entitled shall be calculated in accordance with ordinary common law principles including those relating to mitigation of loss and accelerated receipt.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Without prejudice to clauses 16.1 and 3.2, but notwithstanding any other provision of this agreement, if the Executive shall become unable to perform her duties properly by reason of accident, illness or injury for a period or periods aggregating at least 120 days in any period of 12 consecutive calendar months then the Company may, by not less than six months&rsquo; prior written notice to the Executive given at any time while the Executive is incapacitated by accident, illness or injury from performing her duties under the agreement, terminate the Appointment provided that the Company shall withdraw any such notice if during the currency of the notice the Executive returns to full time duties and provides a medical practitioner&rsquo;s certificate satisfactory to the board to the effect that she has fully recovered her health and that no recurrence of her illness or injury can reasonably be anticipated.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company may suspend the Executive on full pay at any time to investigate any allegations of misconduct relating to her and to hold a disciplinary hearing.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	16.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Upon termination of the Appointment howsoever caused or, if so requested by the Company, on notice being served by either party on the other to terminate the Appointment the Executive shall:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.5.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	immediately deliver up to the Company any property belonging to the Company or any Group Company and any document, computer disk or other data storage device containing any Confidential Information and shall cease to represent herself as being in any way connected with the Company or any Group Company;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.5.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	irretrievably delete any information relating to the business of the Company or any Group Company stored on any magnetic or optical disk or memory and all matter derived therefrom which is in her possession, custody, care or control outside the premises of the Company or any Group Company and shall produce such evidence of compliance with this sub-paragraph as the Company may require; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.5.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	at the request of the Board, immediately resign any directorship office or appointment held by her in the Company or any Group Company without any claim for compensation or damages for loss of such office or appointment and in the event of her failure to do so within five days of such request the Executive hereby irrevocably appoints the Company as her attorney to execute letters of resignation of such directorship, offices or appointments on her behalf and to take such other steps as are necessary to give effect to such resignations; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.5.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	transfer to the Company, or as it may direct all shares held by her in the Company or in any Group Company as nominee or trustee for the Company (except shares granted to her for whatsoever reason during and related to her employment) and deliver to the Company the certificates therefor and the Executive hereby irrevocably appoints the Company as her attorney to execute any such transfer on her behalf.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_160"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	16.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The termination of the Appointment shall not operate to affect those provisions of this agreement which are intended to have effect after the Termination Date.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_161"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	POST TERMINATION RESTRICTIONS
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	For a period of six months immediately following the Termination Date, the Executive shall not, whether by herself or by any servant or agent or otherwise howsoever, and whether on the Executive&rsquo;s own account or on behalf of or in conjunction with any other person, firm, company or other organisation directly or indirectly;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	carry on or assist with, be employed by, be engaged by, hold a position with, be concerned in, interested in or control the carrying on of any activity or business which is the same as or competes with the Restricted Business anywhere in any Restricted Territory, (except as the holder of shares in a company whose shares are listed on a Recognised Investment Exchange which confer not more than 5% in total of the votes which could normally be cast at a general meeting of that Company);
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	in relation to any business which is the same as or in competition with the Restricted Business conduct any business, perform any services for or canvas, solicit or approach or cause to be canvassed or solicited or approached for the purpose of obtaining business, order or custom, or otherwise deal with any person firm, company or other organisation which was a client or customer of the Company or any Group Company at the Termination Date or during the Relevant Period and with whom the Executive had any dealings or of whom the Executive was aware in the course of her employment;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.1.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	in relation to any business the same as or in competition with the Restricted Business conduct any business, perform any services or supply goods to, canvas, solicit or approach or cause to be canvassed, solicited or approached for the purpose of obtaining business, orders or custom any Prospective Customer with whom the Executive had any dealings in the course of her duties at any time in the Relevant Period.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	For a period of 12 months immediately following the Termination Date, the Executive shall not, whether by herself or by any servant or agent or otherwise howsoever, and whether on the Executive&rsquo;s own account or on behalf of or in conjunction with any other person, firm, company or other organisation directly or indirectly:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	offer employment to or employ or offer to or conclude a contract for services in the Restricted Territory with any Restricted Employee or procure or facilitate the making of such an offer;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	seek to entice away from the Company or any Group Company or otherwise solicit or interfere with the relationship between the Company and any Restricted Supplier or any Group Company and any Restricted Supplier.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive shall not at any time after the Termination Date;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	17.3.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	directly or indirectly anywhere in any Restricted Territory carry on a business either alone or jointly with or as officers, manager, agent, consultant or employee of any person whether similar to any part of the business of the Company or any Group Company (as conducted at any time) or otherwise under a title or name comprising or containing the word &ldquo;Eros&rdquo; or any approximation/colourable imitation thereof and she will at all times procure that any company controlled by her will not carry out such business under any such title or name; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">

	17.3.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	say or do anything which is harmful to the reputation or goodwill of the Company or any Group Company or likely to or calculated to lead to any person, firm, company or other organisation withdrawing from or ceasing to continue to offer a Group Company any rights of purchase, sale, import, distribution or agency enjoyed by it;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	hold herself out falsely as being in anyway connected with any Group Company; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

	solicit, entice or procure or endeavour to solicit, entice or procure any employee to breach their contract of employment with the Company or any Group Company or any person to breach their contract for services with the Company or any Group Company.
</FONT>
</TD>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_163"></A>

	17.4
</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The period of each of the above restrictions shall be reduced by the period, if any, during which the Company exercises its rights under clause 3.5.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive has had an opportunity to consider the restrictions prior to execution of this agreement and agrees that each of the restrictions set out above constitutes severable and independent covenants and restrictions upon her the duration, extent and application of each of which is no greater than is reasonably necessary for the protection of the goodwill and legitimate trade connections of the Restricted Business.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Further, if a restriction in clauses 17.1 to 17.3 of this agreement is found void but would be valid if some part of it were deleted, the restriction shall apply with such deletion as may be necessary to make it valid and effective.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive recognises that, given her role with the Company and within the Group and the Group&rsquo;s structure, the Company has an interest in the business of the Group Companies which it is legitimate for it to protect by the covenants set out above.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_164"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Notwithstanding and without prejudice to the foregoing provisions of this clause 17 it is acknowledged by the Executive that the Company holds the benefit of these covenants on trust for any Group Company as the Company may direct in substantially the same terms as the covenants the Executive has entered into with the Company. Further, if so requested by the Company, the Executive shall enter into separate contracts with a Group Company for performance of additional duties in exchange for separate compensation as agreed with the Group Company which will not interfere or conflict with her duties under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	17.9
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive shall show these restrictions to any firm, person, company or other organisation which is the same as or competes with or proposes or is likely to compete with the Restricted Business which offers her employment or a contract for services to her and which she accepts or is minded to accept.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_165"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	18.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<B>
	DATA PROTECTION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	18.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive shall at all times during the Appointment adhere to any policy introduced by the Company from time to time to comply with the DPA or equivalent legislation in any other relevant jurisdiction. Breach of this undertaking will constitute a disciplinary offence.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	18.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive hereby consents to the Company holding and processing both electronically and manually the personal data it collects which relates to the Executive which is necessary or reasonably required for the proper performance of this agreement, for management, administrative and other employment related purposes (both during and after the Appointment) or for the conduct of the Group&rsquo;s business or to comply with applicable law, rules and regulations (the &ldquo;Authorised Purposes&rdquo;) and the Executive agrees to provide the Group with all personal data relating to her which is necessary or reasonably required for the Authorised Purposes.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	18.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive explicitly consents to the Company or any other Group Company processing her personal data, including her sensitive personal data, where this is necessary or reasonably required to achieve one or more of the Authorised Purposes.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	18.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Executive acknowledges that the Company may, from time to time collect or disclose her personal data (including her sensitive personal data) from and to third parties (including without limitation the Executive&rsquo;s referees, any management consultants or computer maintenance companies engaged by the Company, the Company&rsquo;s professional advisers, other Group Companies, any suppliers of goods or services to the Group and any potential purchasers of the business carried on by the Company and/or the Group). The Executive consents to such collection and disclosure even where this involves the transfer of such data, with appropriate safeguards, outside the European Economic Area where this is necessary or reasonably required to achieve one or more of the Authorised Purposes or is in the interests of the Company and/or its shareholders.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	18.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The Company agrees to process any personal data made available to it by the Executive in accordance with the provisions of the DPA.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

	this clause &ldquo;data controller&rdquo; &ldquo;personal data&rdquo; &ldquo;processing&rdquo; and &ldquo;sensitive personal data&rdquo; shall have the meaning set out in section 1 of the DPA.

</TD>

<B>
	GRIEVANCE AND DISCIPLINARY PROCEDURES
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	19.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	If the Executive has any grievance relating to the Appointment she should raise it with the Executive Chairman either orally or in writing. If she is dissatisfied with that person&rsquo;s decision she should refer the matter in writing to the Board, whose decision shall be final. In the event that the Executive&rsquo;s grievance relates to the Executive Chairman, she should raise it with an independent director of the Board initially, either orally or in writing and then the Board; if she is dissatisfied with the independent director&rsquo;s decision, the Board&rsquo;s decision shall be final.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE">

	Any disciplinary matters relating to the Executive shall be dealt with by the Board and in accordance with the Company&rsquo;s disciplinary procedures in effect from time to time.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

	by physical delivery &ndash; upon delivery to the Company&rsquo;s premises or the Executive&rsquo;s notified place of residence (as the case may be) provided that if the delivery is effected after usual business hours, the communication shall be deemed to be received on the next following business day at 09:00 local time;
</FONT>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_169"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: WHITE; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX; FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	21.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT: 11PT/107% CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In proving service by post it shall only be necessary for a party to prove that the communication was in an envelope which was duly addressed, stamped and posted by registered or recorded delivery post.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	For the purpose of this clause a &ldquo;business
	day&rdquo; means a day on which the clearing banks in the United Arab Emirates are open for business. &ldquo;Close of business&rdquo;
	means 18.00 hours local time in Dubai.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This agreement shall be governed by
	and construed in accordance with the laws of the Isle of Man and each party to this agreement submits to the exclusive jurisdiction
	of the Isle of Man courts.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

	includes all knowledge and information (whether or
	not recorded in a documentary or machine-readable form) relating to the actual or proposed terms of business of the Company and/or
	any Group Company, the names, addresses and contact details of any clients of the Company and/or any Group Company; the marketing
	plans and/or strategies (including those relating to maturing business prospects) of the Company and/or any Group Company&rsquo;s
	accounts information, its budgeting information,

	formulae, inventions, designs, know how and, any other technical information or data of the Company and/or any Group Company relating

	to be traded in by the Company and/or any Group Company with a view to profit; and, any other information to which the Company
	and/or any Group Company attaches an equivalent level of confidentiality or in respect of which it owes an obligation of confidentiality
	to any third party.

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.4
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Group&rdquo;
</B>
	and
<B>
	&ldquo;Group Company&rdquo;
</B>
	shall mean the Company and any
	other company which is its holding or subsidiary company or subsidiary of such holding company or affiliate of the company from
	time to time (where &ldquo;holding company&rdquo; and &ldquo;subsidiary&rdquo; have the meanings given to them by the Companies
	Act 1974).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.5
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Restricted Executive&rdquo;
</B>
	shall mean any person who was at the date of the termination
	of the Executive&rsquo;s employment employed by the Company and/or any Group Company who had access to Confidential Information
	or Trade Secrets and/or with whom the Executive had personal dealings during the period of twelve months prior to the termination
	of the Executive&rsquo;s employment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	1.6
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Restricted Products/Services&rdquo;
</B>
	shall mean:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.6.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the business of manufacturing, selling, leasing, renting, distributing, advertising, publicising,
	marketing or otherwise exploiting home video devices; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 1IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.6.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	all and any other products and/or services developed and/or produced by the Company and/or any
	Group Company which are or are proposed to be dealt in, marketed or sold by it with a view to profit; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.6.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in respect of which the Executive has been concerned or involved with to a material extent during
	the period of 12 months prior to the termination of his employment or otherwise in relation to which he possesses any Confidential
	Information and/or Trade Secrets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.7
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&ldquo;Trade Secrets&rdquo;
</B>
	means trade secrets or other information which is otherwise
	of such a highly confidential nature as to be of a status equivalent to that of a trade secret and whether or not it falls within
	the definition of Confidential Information.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

</B>
	means Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
</TD>
</TR>

<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.9
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Headings to clauses are for convenience only and shall not affect their construction or meaning.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.10
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any reference to the provisions of an enactment shall be deemed to refer to the same as in force
	(including any amendment or re-enactment) at the time by reference to which the same falls to be interpreted.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">

	1.11

</TD>

	References to clauses and/or Appendices are, unless otherwise stated, references to clauses and/or
	Appendices to this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	1.12
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where the context permits, the singular includes the plural and vice versa and one gender includes
	any gender. Words importing individuals shall be treated as importing corporations and vice versa and words importing whole shall
	be treated as including a reference to any part thereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	2
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	EMPLOYMENT
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company shall employ the
	Executive and the Executive shall serve the Company as its Head - Investor Relations &amp; Corporate Finance and in such other
	capacity or capacities within the Group and with such responsibilities as are within the Executive&rsquo;s abilities as the Company
	may from time to time reasonably specify. The Executive will report directly to the Group Chief Executive Officer.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	3
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	PERIOD OF EMPLOYMENT
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<B>
	3.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Executive&rsquo;s employment hereunder shall commence on 28
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	April 2014 and shall
	continue unless otherwise terminated in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Subject to clause 12, the Executive&rsquo;s employment shall start on commencement date and shall
	continue thereafter until terminated by either party to the other not less than 3 months prior written notice of termination.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company shall (subject to clause 12) be entitled to make a payment in lieu of any unexpired
	period of notice of termination given by either party. Such payment shall be limited to the Executive&rsquo;s basic salary at the
	rate payable at the date notice is given and shall include any payment in respect of pension or other benefits.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0 0 0 1IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	3.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If not previously terminated, the Executive&rsquo;s employment shall in any event automatically
	terminate on the day on which the Executive attains the age of sixty five years.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT/NORMAL TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
